scene_description_enriched: A circular medallion depicts a stylized scorpion with its pincers raised and tail curved over its back. The scorpion is rendered in shades of beige and brown, with segmented body and legs. It is set against a red background filled with intricate gold scrolling foliage. Below the scorpion, a band of green represents water with a few reeds. The entire scene is framed by a gold border.
